name: PR #1 Review Fixes
details: Fix the 5 issues identified in PR #1 code review for cc-view-transcript's SessionResolver

tasks.name: Fix fileExists/isDirectory
tasks.details: Distinguish ENOENT from other errors in fileExists() and isDirectory() methods. Currently all errors return false, hiding permission/filesystem errors.

tasks.name: Fix getAgentParentId
tasks.details: Fix resource leak (try/finally for stream cleanup) and add warning log for errors instead of silent suppression.

tasks.name: Fix scanProjectDir errors
tasks.details: Add warning logs when directory can't be read or files skipped. Don't silently return empty array on errors.

tasks.name: Fix --max-length validation
tasks.details: Check next arg exists and isn't a flag before parsing --max-length value.

tasks.name: Fix duplicate processing
tasks.details: Deduplicate toProcess array before processing multiple sessions.
